AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled through South Texas, led by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, with inadequate water and food, subjected to substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury during the smuggling journey, transported unrestrained in the bed of a pickup truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: defendant, alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas, misrepresented the length of the journey as one day
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: adult female who died during the smuggling operation due to heat stroke caused by harsh conditions in the South Texas desert, described as a 142-pound, normally developed and adequately nourished adult female in the autopsy report
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: location of the smuggling journey guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, characterized by harsh desert conditions in June that contributed to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez
